author: chfast
content: Some of these tests should be revisit. I don't think there is any benefit of having a test which calls SHA256 50000x over a one which calls SHA256 5x. Similarly, invoking blake2b with 4B iterations.

author: dimitry8570
content: Indeed. That's rather a benchmark test

author: chfast
content: I'm happy to write benchmarks for EVM if there is a framework in EEST for it.
